data.title: Attn Marketing pr
data.meta_description: An experienced team of PR, marketing, digital and social content media and communications specialists, graphic designers, web developers.
data.text:
About us

Attn marketing pr is a well established public relations and marketing firm based in Hawke’s Bay.

Founded by Anna Lorck and Damon Harvey in 2003, Attn! has worked with many local and national businesses as well as the region’s local councils, leading many of the region’s most significant public campaigns. The team has also helped launch many of the region’s most high profile brands and has been instrumental in the growth of many local businesses into national and international brands.

What sets us apart are our deep connections and strong relationships across all sectors – if you’re looking to establish your profile, we’re the best in the game.

Anna and Damon started their careers as journalists and can write engaging content across all media platforms – from traditional media such as print through to digital and social media. We know that content is KING (or QUEEN). Your content needs to be engaging, compelling, exciting, informative, imaginative while at the same time SIMPLE. That’s our expertise – to bring your brand and business to life using a wide range of communication and marketing tools.

We have an experienced and well connected team of PR, marketing and communications specialists, designers, web developers and videographers at the ready. We are the ‘go to’ in establishing new businesses as well as assisting businesses in capital raise and new business opportunities.

Lastly – we’re LOYAL & LOCAL. Over the years we have supported many local not-for-profit organisations. Over the years we’re proud to be involved with the likes of Mates 4 Life workplace suicide prevention programme, the Hawke’s Bay Basketball Academy (developing youth), The Jarrod Cunningham Youth Sport Trust, Sport Hawke’s Bay, Hawke’s Bay Rugby and many others.
